Html:
When I try to load my fury warrior (Khorgan - Dalaran US), all the items in the database are given a value of zero.  I've loaded all my other characters with no issue, it only seem to happen to him.  I also noticed that load times for that character are MUCH longer than for my others.  I have cleared my caches for the web-based version as well as downloading the executable, but both have the same results.  I can load a different character afterward, and the items go back to displaying normal values.

I'd list this on the Issue Tracker, but that appears to be down.

There is a similar issue in the tracker already. I beleive it's under the heading DPSWarr low DPs or something similar. Please attach your character file to that issue whenever the tracker comes back up.
